Attention All who wants serial or dosent know how to crack Game.

Follow these easy steps to download a Cracked EXE that dosent require serial.

1. Open http://www.gamecopyworld.com/

2. Select a Mirror then click on "Enter" Now look at the right side for PC section click on [T-Z] that is below Games, now select Warlords Battlecry 3 In W

3.Click on "Warlords Battlecry 3 v1.0 [ENGLISH] Fixed EXE"
then click on the Blue Icon, it is on left of "File Archive [846 KB]"
now select a mirror your download will be started.

4. Unrar(De-Compress) the files Using Winrar or any other capable rar compression Program.

5.Now you have Battlecry III.exe file copy it and paste it in the folder where you have the game installed it will ask to overwrite Click Yes.

6.YAY your game is now cracked play it now dumb follow the same procedure to Crack any other game.
